detailsText: Below you can find detailed information on our big day, such as the schedule of the day, how you could contribute to the evening programm, the dresscode, as well as our bridal registry that we ask you to consult should you wish to gift us.
scheduleText: The detailed description of the day‚Äôs program below provides you with all necessary information you need to prepare yourself mentally and physically for the upcoming festivities. Make sure to be on time, as the only person allowed to be late is the bride üòâ.
programWhat2: Transfer to the wedding location from hotel Vienna House
programWhat3: Wedding ceremony followed by a small aperitif
programWhere4: Departure at Rhysch√º√ºr of Gasthaus Schupfen
giftsText:
If you are on the lookout for the perfect wedding gift for us look no further. You would make us immensely happy with a contribution towards our honeymoon!
 We are planning on doing something special for this occasion, and given our love for animals and nature, we decided to go on a trip to the <location_anchor>wildlife conservation Masai Mara in Kenya</location_anchor>. Maybe there, the bride‚Äôs dream of seeing her favourite animal in real life will finally come true ü¶Å!
eveningContributionText: If you wish to contribute with something particular to the evening program, please reach out to our <contacts_anchor>best man or  maid of honor</contacts_anchor>.
dresscodeText:
Pack your dancing shoes and be ready to take out your nicest suits and gowns! The dress code of the reception is <link_anchor>formal</link_anchor>.
 If you want to make us extra happy, following our color theme of the day (olive, black, gold or earthy tones) would definitely do that.
